[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@microsoft/rush-lib](./rush-lib.md) &gt; [PnpmOptionsConfiguration](./rush-lib.pnpmoptionsconfiguration.md) &gt; [autoInstallPeers](./rush-lib.pnpmoptionsconfiguration.autoinstallpeers.md)

## PnpmOptionsConfiguration.autoInstallPeers property

When true, any missing non-optional peer dependencies are automatically installed.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly autoInstallPeers: boolean | undefined;
```

## Remarks

The default value is same as PNPM default value. (In PNPM 8.x, this value is true)
